name: Gallery Thief Multiplayer
description:
There are two factions:  the securities and the thieves.

As a Security, you have to guard the gallery, which is filled with people. But one or more of these (depends on players) could be thieves and stealing your paintings. Your Job is it to find and kill these thieves before they steal the given amount of paintings.

As a Thief, you have the option to steal paintings or kill the NPCs  for points  before the time runs out, or the security catches you.
